block.p: GREENWALD-Sandor. On August 28, 2000. Beloved husband of the late Anna, devoted father of Myrna and Edward Weisselberg, & Rochelle Greenwald Bonafede, cherished grandfather of Deborah, Joanne, Michael, Dianne, and Joseph. Loving great grandfather. Dear brother of Mary Gluck, Pearl Solner, and Helen Falkowitz. Services on Wednesday, August 30, 2000, 1 P.M. at ''Boulevard-Riverside'' Chapels, 1895 Flatbush Avenue, Brooklyn, New York.
